resource_explanation:
El Plano group's lecturers API(created for the group by group owner).

Course attributes :

 - `first_name` - Represents lecturer first name
 - `last_name` - Represents lecturer last name
 - `patronymic` - Represents lecturer patronymic 
 - `timestamps`

Also, includes reference to the courses.
explanation: Delete lecturer. NOTE : This action allowed only for group owner user.

requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/group/lecturers/11" -d '' -X DELETE \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 8bc311a7bab7db0927947eb6ce534ab3d200aa56e8ce2d765aefcabb165d262f" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
